name: PARRALENTAGRAM
description:
2 witches run around in parallel dimensions, appearing as ghosts in each others worlds. They each try to complete a dark ritual which gives them the ability to vanquish the ghost (the opposing player)- for the other player this will look like the enemy ghost is chasing them down. Which witch is the wickedest? and which ghost can do the most? Only time will tell!

how to make a session:

1: launch the game with steam open, and have your friend do the same

2: press "½" to  access the console and type "create session"

3: press enter

4: and have your friend type " find and join session" in their console

5: have them press enter

6: you're done :D
